text: 9:15 Daniel 9:14; Rom 3:19; 1 Korin 15:17O Ikiavɨra Itir God, nɨ Israelian God, nɨ arazir aghuibaram ami. Ezɨ e arazir kurabagh amima, nɨ pazavɨra e gamima, en ikiavɨra itir varazira iti. Egha e fo, e nɨn boroghɨn mangasava, e gumazamizir aghuiba puvatɨ. E arazir kurabagh amir gumazamiziba, egha e osɨmtɨzim ikia, nɨn damazimɨn tuivan ibura.”
